title: Bookworm - Mazeh
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Middle Eastern, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Tola'at Sfarim Bookstore and cafe with vegan dishes marked on menu in every category with at least 2 vegan dishes offered. The vegan breakfast is served all day which consists of 4 spreads made of vegetables, nuts and legumes, a chickpea omelet/crepe, salad, coffee with soy milk, fresh juice, breads and jam. Has vegan brownies and chocolate-chip cookies. Books to read while you're there (not for loan, and mostly in Hebrew). Has Wi-Fi.
